content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Hello Juan, thank you for considering our apartment. Based on our discussions, we are willing to offer you the rental price of €850 per month.
name: Juan Mamani

content:
I would like to negotiate. Can you give me your counteroffer?

name: Heinrich Heine

content: Of course, Juan. In light of our discussions, we are willing to consider a lower rental price for you. Our counteroffer is €750 per month.
name: Juan Mamani

content:
